1_1H8x2Aeu28Lnj6vhXFNZ32kpvGS6dnqWGA.body: I like the system over all. The fact that the sites I visit are updated and stored locally is a HUGE, and would love to use it as a defacto testing ground for web-apps . That being said I would love to see iframes work, even if its regulated to inter-Zeronet sites.
